# Available modules


The overview below shows which sparse-neighbors-search installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using sparse-neighbors-search, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load sparse-neighbors-search/0.7-foss-2022a
```
